summary: An Irish maid falls for the son of her wealthy boss, though their disapproving fathers and a bitter strike at the steel mill complicates matters.
cast: Greer Garson|Gregory Peck|Donald Crisp|Lionel Barrymore|Preston Foster|Marsha Hunt|Gladys Cooper|Reginald Owen|Dan Duryea|Jessica Tandy|Barbara Everest|Marshall Thompson|Geraldine Wall|Evelyn Dockson|John Warburton|Russell Hicks|Mary Lord|Arthur Shields|Dean Stockwell|Mary Currier|Richard Abbott|Freddie Chapman|Sherlee Collier|Kernan Cripps|Willa Pearl Curtis|Bryn Davis|Jim Farley|Warren Farlow|Wayne A. Farlow|Connie Gilchrist|Vincent Graeff|Jesse Graves|Lumsden Hare|Joy Harington|Timmy Hawkins|Gerald Mackey|Anna Q. Nilsson|William O'Leary|Norman Ollestad|Moroni Olsen|Lee Phelps|Mike Ryan|Pat Ryan|George Sherwood|Harry Strang
title: El valle del destino
